scripts.setup: npm run setup-folders && npm run setup-packages
scripts.setup-folders: cd src && mkdir components mechanisms && cd components && mkdir atoms molecules organisms templates pages && cd ../mechanisms && mkdir Modules Components && cd ../../public && mkdir fonts pics
scripts.setup-packages: npm i react react-dom && npm i -D @types/react @types/react-dom @vitejs/plugin-react sass typescript vite vite-tsconfig-paths
